d1_flags: 1. goto C60322 if GOT_PAIR_OF_DIRTY_SOCKS is set
d1_text:
Npc0778:
ï¿½(I lost a pair of contact lenses here in the Dusty Dunes Desert.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½They were a momento from my grandma, and very important to me.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If you find them, bring them to me and I'll give you a reward.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'm Penetella Giovanni.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Find me at the Fourside Bakery, second floor.)[GOTO_IF_FLAG GOT_PAIR_OF_DIRTY_SOCKS L_C60322]
[HALT][END]
